short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close tabs and get reminded to reopen them later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine if you could sleep a tab the same way you could sleep an email...

Well now you can!

Tab Sleeper lets you put a tab to "sleep", letting you close that tab for now and have it automatically reopen at a later time and date.

Perfect for people who use their tabs as a todo list :).
